purpose: Provide a single deterministic signal (0-100) that summarizes product and system risk for release gating.
calculation: riskScore = 0.35 * UDI + 0.30 * FunctionHealth + 0.15 * Friction + 0.12 * Trend_UDI + 0.08 * Trend_FunctionHealth; all components clamped 0-100; rounded, deterministic
operationalInterpretation: 0-30: healthy, 31-60: degraded but acceptable, 61-80: serious degradation, >80: critical regression
